reviewText: Not much of a self help book reader? Then this is the self-help DVD and toolkit for you. The video is outstanding (and the winner of a prestigous Silver Telly Award), easy to watch, compelling, and informative. The workbook contains all of the basic information you'll need to give your lawyer, mediator, collaborative lawyer, legal aid and/or the court---whichever type of agency is helping you with your divorce. The AFCC booklet that's enclosed, Shared Parenting Guide, is one of the best single resources available for creating a parenting plan. All in all, a terrific package at a reasonable price (especially considering what lawyers charge). Review written by Diana Mercer, the Co Author of Your Divorce Advisor Your Divorce Advisor : A Lawyer and a Psychologist GuideYou Through the Legal and Emotional Landscape of Divorce
